text:
The police are on the lookout for unidentified men in connection with burglary in a house at Annathanapatti here on Saturday.

Kalaignar Mani, left with his family members for celebrating Pongal in a relative’s house. The locks on the doors of his house were found broken open on Saturday morning.

Gold jewellery weighing 150 sovereign and cash were missing from the house. The police have registered a case.In another incident, miscreants broke open the house of Vadivukkarasi in Naazhikkalpatti near here and took away 49 sovereign gold jewellery. The inmates were away when the miscreants struck.
title: Houses burgled
